c:simple-property.name: hostname
c:simple-property.description: Management IP Address - this is typically the jboss.bind.address.management address. Initialized to hostname of parent RHQ Server resource.

c:simple-property.name: port
c:simple-property.description: JMX Management Port used to communicate with the app server over the JMX protocol. Initialized to management port + 9 (the standard offset) of parent RHQ Server.

c:simple-property.name: username

c:simple-property.name: password

c:simple-property.name: RawDataAgeLimit
c:simple-property.description: A limit, specified in days, on the age of raw data that is ingested. If raw data has a timestamp that is more than limit days old, then it is not stored. This prevents data that is for example a year old from being stored.

c:group.name: Aggregation
c:group.c:description: Settings for tuning performance of metrics aggregation that runs hourly.

c:simple-property.name: AggregationBatchSize
c:simple-property.description: Specifies the number of schedules for which data will be fetched per thread. Defaults to 5. Changing this value takes effect immediately and persists across restarts.

c:simple-property.name: AggregationParallelism
c:simple-property.description: Specifies the number of batches that can be processed in parallel. Defaults to 3. A higher value can improve aggregation performance at the expense of higher heap utilization (during aggregation). Changing this value takes effect immediately and persists across restarts.

c:simple-property.name: AggregationWorkers
c:simple-property.description: The number of threads to use during aggregation. It defaults to ceiling(4, num_cores). Changing this value only takes effect after a server restart.

c:simple-property.name: RequestLimit
c:simple-property.description: Sets throttling in terms of requests per second. Defaults to 30,000 if undefined. Note that this setting is automatically changed when various events such as request timeouts occur.

c:simple-property.name: MinRequestLimit
c:simple-property.description: This sets a minimum threshold for the request limit. If the request limit is automatically decreased, it will never drop below this value.

c:simple-property.name: RequestLimitTopologyDelta
c:simple-property.description: The request limit will automatically change by this amount when there is a topology change event. Topology change events include nodes being added/removed and nodes going up/down. Defaults to 30,000 if undefined.

c:simple-property.name: RequestTimeoutDelta
c:simple-property.description: When a request times out, the limit is decreased by this amount. The value is interpreted as a percentage. Defaults to 0.2 (i.e., 20%) if undefined.

c:simple-property.name: MaintenanceModeAtStartup
